title: Second Track fault causing delays on North-South Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 第二轨道故障导致南北线延误
title_translations.ms: Jalan landasan kedua menyebabkan kelewatan di Laluan Utara-Selatan
title_translations.ta: வடக்கு-தெற்கு பாதையில் தாமதத்தை ஏற்படுத்தும் இரண்டாவது பாதை தவறு

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train service from #AngMoKio to #Admiralty on the NSL is running normally now.
[NSL] UPDATE: Our engineers are attending to a track fault.
[NSL]: Estimate 15mins additional travelling time from #AngMoKio to #Admiralty towards #JurongEast.
